tweets.text:
Today is the start of #FloodActionWeek!

Over the next 7 days, make it your aim to know what to do in a flood to keep yourself and the things you love safe.

Take the first step and visit üëâhttps://t.co/CFSTzxnzju

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/4PO64ouIJz

Do you know what to do in a flood? 

This #FloodActionWeek make it your mission to know the simple steps to take if a Flood Alert, Flood Warning, or Severe Flood Warning is issued in your area ‚¨áÔ∏è

https://t.co/CFSTzx5XUU

 #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/3TnT9f173j

It's #FloodActionWeek To learn more about Somerset's Flood Groups, and how volunteers help to reduce the risk of flooding in our communities, watch the video below #prepare #act #survive @EnvAgencySW @EnvAgency @SRACommunities 
https://t.co/nE7Fu4TBAK

Press release from @BeaverTrust https://t.co/7ZyRCQdbvL

@SPavelle @nature_scot @NaturalEngland @gow_derek @strathearnrose @VictoriaPrentis @pow_rebecca @ninaconstable @ScotlandTBP @CLAtweets @NFUtweets @NFUStweets @NFUS_Angus @WCL_News @Mammal_Society @EnvAgency @ForestryComm https://t.co/ghAndCHixu

tweets.text: We're hosting our very first virtual resident meeting for the Otley Flood Alleviation scheme on Wednesday 18 November, from 4pm. Join us, @BAMNuttall and @EnvAgencyYNE as we give an update and answer all your questions. Sign up here https://t.co/4x3QvxTUfv #flooding #Leeds https://t.co/VV2L5pPF12

It's #FloodActionWeek and also 10yrs since the Nov 2010 floods that affected 300+ properties in Cornwall. Following the floods The EA & @CornwallCouncil created @CwllCFloodForum to help before, during & after a flood. 
Do you know what to do in a flood? https://t.co/4F9BadnblZ https://t.co/oZe6Kg8BsR

Secretary @EnvAgency in Preston

See: https://t.co/ktRwQXlx7A

#LancashireJobs https://t.co/OGQMR0fVhH

Do you know what to do in a flood? Make sure you know the simple steps to take if a Flood Alert, Flood Warning, or Severe Flood Warning is issued in your area üëá

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/sXatK90YWd

Great to see survey work starting on the latest phase of the Rotherham Renaissance Flood Alleviation Scheme. This ¬£20 million project extends along a 5km stretch of the River Don through #Templeborough, the town centre and #Parkgate areas of #Rotherham. https://t.co/NCyt8atUoA https://t.co/35dvw3ld08

Five things you could do this #FloodActionWeek:
@EnvAgency  @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgencyNW @itvcalendar @manalilukha https://t.co/uouh57TCG4

Our team have been carrying out macro-invertebrate  surveys in log-jams that were introduced to a stream. Great news - the habitat is looking fantastic! Surveys are a great way of finding out the health of the invertebrate populations. üëå @EnvAgency @HeritageFundNW @SouthWestPeak https://t.co/xn5fvnAR1J

Our Field Teams are prepared to take action wherever it is needed & have been training to make sure they are ready to respond this winter. 

At #Northwich, they have been working with partners to put the #flood scheme, which protects hundreds of homes & business, to the test. https://t.co/sXG85XHmUY

It's #FloodActionWeek, and I've written a blog on how #TeamEA have been preparing for winter - from building & repairing new flood defences, to enhancing our #FloodWarning system and training 6,500 staff: https://t.co/pVdjmzZUIL

The @EnvAgency is ready for winter, are you?

Would you know what to do in a flood?

#PrepareActSurvive

Taking action before a flood could keep the things you care about safe.

 https://t.co/i4gLVW9024

#Floodaware @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency https://t.co/dxzprvy7ID

Sangeetha, one of our brilliant #geomorphologists in @EnvAgencyMids, helped with the design of this #river restoration scheme in #StokeOnTrent.

An example of what's possible in urban settings, even during trying times like these, when working in partnership. https://t.co/2xDxuiFitR

tweets.text:
Would you like to play a part in flood & coastal risk management in Devon, Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly?

We're looking for 2 new members representing Nature & Conservation, & Coastal Processes for our South West Regional Flood & Coastal Committee 

https://t.co/XcfNKq8h0L https://t.co/pXFBxGPPt2

Flood defences across South Yorkshire, damaged by the November 2019 floods, have been repaired or have temporary repairs or measures in place for winter, as part of a regional flood recovery programme. We're working in #Fishlake to strengthen defences https://t.co/Zqt4pI1Jx1 https://t.co/ZgIKgIhScM

@LBRuT_Help @Gareth_Roberts_ @fergalsharky81 @JuliaNedenWatts @EnvAgencySE PLEASE PLEASE come and clear the fallen trees in the River Crane at Crane Park @EnvAgencySE it‚Äôs an eyesore @Daily_Express @richmondtimes https://t.co/In4XB8L4OR

Devastated business owners and residents paid the price in Leeds on boxing day 2015. 

Don‚Äôt let that be you.

Make a plan and be prepared.

Find out how https://t.co/wwueotSYc7 

#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware

Do you know what to do if you receive a flood warning? 

Know your warning codes! ‚ö†Ô∏è

Find out more https://t.co/wwueotBnkz

#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware https://t.co/Vk2OtrTGXG

Would you believe that some residents in Shrewsbury are still out of their properties after Storm Dennis caused flooding in February earlier this year. Flooding has an impact far beyond the actual event & can take months to get back to some sort of normality. #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/plnKsUK1l0

Why don't you sign up for flood warnings from the 
@EnvAgency - it's a free service and could save your life!

More information can be found here https://t.co/khQ2JbP7pJ

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/aGvZDtY1X2

Some great drone footage and imagery of the NFM interventions and wider Isbourne catchment. Thanks to the guys @worcester_uni. Click link to see pano. @josieellalynch @Worldwidevillan @worcscc @EnvAgencyMids @isbournecatch #nfm #nfmbydrone #slowtheflow https://t.co/BiDQWhYaFP https://t.co/90nnMB2AxC

The average cost to repair a home after flooding is ¬£30k. If your home or business is at risk of flooding, be prepared. 
To found out more about what to do in a flood
 Visit: https://t.co/29saU23JrY. #FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSave #Midlands üè†üåä. https://t.co/NyiEH5MybW

tweets.text:
5.2 million properties in England are at risk of #flooding. 

Flood damage to a home costs around ¬£30,000 to repair; the cost to a business is about ¬£82,000. 

Find out now how to be prepared- https://t.co/ZEHl74ryiJ

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/JA0veyjv6a

Look! @wessexwater, who last year spent 107,434 hours dumping sewage into local rivers and on 813 separate occasions dumped sewage into our seas, has just applied to the @EnvAgency for a new sewage dumping permit.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Entertainment Tonight
entity.description: Each episode gives viewers an inside look at television, film and music, including interviews with each industry's biggest stars. Over the years, many celebrities have "broken their silence" regarding various scandals or tragedies with hosts and correspondents from "ET." In addition to covering breaking news, the show visits sets of movies and TV shows and heads to the red carpet to cover awards shows and other major events. Airing daily since 1981, "Entertainment Tonight" is the template by which many other entertainment newsmagazines are based.
